regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re html = '' html += client.request('https://www.eporner.com/category/4k-porn/') html = re.sub('&#[0-9]+;', '\'', html) html = html.replace('&quot'+';', '"') html = html.replace('&', '&') html = html.replace('&#039;', '&') express = 'mvhdico"><span>(.+?)<\/span>.+?<a\shref="(.+?)"\stitle="(.+?)".+?src="(.+?)"' links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html) return links

regex.name: playurl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re url = 'https://www.eporner.com' + '[makelist.param2]' html = client.request(url) html = re.sub('Download', 'Play', html) express = '<a href="(\/dload.+?)">(.+?)<\/a>' links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html) return links

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re html = '' html += client.request('https://www.eporner.com/0/') html += client.request('https://www.eporner.com/1/') html = re.sub('&#[0-9]+;', '\'', html) html = html.replace('&quot'+';', '"') html = html.replace('&', '&') html = html.replace('&#039;', '&') express = 'mvhdico"><span>(.+?)<\/span>.+?<a\shref="(.+?)"\stitle="(.+?)".+?src="(.+?)"' links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html) return links

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re html = '' html += client.request('http://www.amatsonly.com/') html += client.request('http://www.amatsonly.com/?page=2') html += client.request('http://www.amatsonly.com/?page=3') html += client.request('http://www.amatsonly.com/?page=4') html += client.request('http://www.amatsonly.com/?page=5') html += client.request('http://www.amatsonly.com/?page=6') html += client.request('http://www.amatsonly.com/?page=7') html += client.request('http://www.amatsonly.com/?page=8') html = re.sub('&#[0-9]+;', ''', html) html = html.replace('&quot'+';', '"') html = html.replace('&', '&') html = html.replace('&#039;', '&') express = '<div class="col-sm-6 col-md-6">
.+?
.+?
.+?<h4><a\shref="(.+?)"\stitle="(.+?)".+?
.+?
.+?
.+?src="(.+?)"' links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html) return links

regex.name: playurl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re url = '[makelist.param1]' html = client.request(url) express = '<source src="(.+?)" type=\'video\/mp4\' \/>' links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html)[0] return links

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re html = '' html += client.request('http://www.yuvutu.com/index.php?name=Video&op=videos&list=most_recent') html += client.request('http://www.yuvutu.com/modules.php?name=Video&op=videos&list=most_recent&period=last_week&filter=0&channel=1&style=1&page=2&category=0&country_code=&min_length=0') html += client.request('http://www.yuvutu.com/modules.php?name=Video&op=videos&list=most_recent&period=last_week&filter=0&channel=1&style=1&page=3&category=0&country_code=&min_length=0') html = re.sub('&#[0-9]+;', '\'', html) html = html.replace('&quot'+';', '"') html = html.replace('&', '&') html = html.replace('&#039;', '&') express = '<a\shref="\/(video.+?)".+?src="(.+?)".+?title="(.+?)"\s\/><\/a>' links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html) return links

regex.name: playurl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re main = 'http://www.yuvutu.com/' + '[makelist.param1]' html = client.request(main) html = html.replace('\\', '') express = '<iframe\ssrc="(\/embed.+?)"' links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html)[0] embed = 'http://www.yuvutu.com' + links html = client.request(embed) express2 = 'file: "(.+?)"' play = re.compile(express2, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html)[0] return play

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re html = '' html += client.request('http://momxxx.org/') html += client.request('http://momxxx.org/page/2/') html += client.request('http://momxxx.org/page/3/') html = re.sub('&#[0-9]+;', '\'', html) html = html.replace('&quot'+';', '"') html = html.replace('&', '&') express = 'href="(.+?)".+?title="(.+?)">.+?data-src="(.+?)"' links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html) return links

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re html = '' html += client.request('http://motherless.com/videos/recent') html += client.request('http://motherless.com/videos/recent?page=2') html = re.sub('&#[0-9]+;', ''', html) html = html.replace('&quot'+';', '"') html = html.replace('&', '&') html = html.replace('&#039;', '&') html = html.split('<h1>
.+?Most\sRecent\sVideos', 1)[-1] html = html.split('<div class='pagination_link'>', 1)[0] express = '<div class="thumb-container.+?
.+?<a\shref="(.+?)".+?
.+?src="(.+?)".+?alt="(.+?)"' links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html) return links

regex.name: playurl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re main = '[makelist.param1]' html = client.request(main) express = 'fileurl = \'(.+?)\'' links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html)[0] return links
